titles.title: Murazukuri Game no NPC ga Namami no Ningen to shika Omoenai
This Village Sim NPC Could Only Be Human
I can't Help But to Think the NPCs in This Town-building Game are Human Beings
村づくりゲームのNPCが生身の人間としか思えない
The NPCs in this Village Sim Game Must Be Real!

title: Murazukuri Game no NPC ga Namami no Ningen to shika Omoenai
title_english: The NPCs in this Village Sim Game Must Be Real!
title_japanese: 村づくりゲームのNPCが生身の人間としか思えない
title_synonyms: This Village Sim NPC Could Only Be Human
I can't Help But to Think the NPCs in This Town-building Game are Human Beings
synopsis:
Yoshio is a thirty-year-old shut-in with no job and no prospects, still living at home after all these years. His mundane life is suddenly interrupted when he receives a copy of "The Village of Fate," an experimental game with graphics and A.I. like nothing he's ever seen before.

In the game, he takes on the role of a guardian deity who watches over the people of a new village...but he finds that the game characters are so intelligent, so reactive, so human that he starts to wonder if they might somehow be real people. Through his connection to their strangely vivid lives, Yoshio begins to discover the brightness that had been missing from his own existence.

(Source: Seven Seas Entertainment)
background: Murazukuri Game no NPC ga Namami no Ningen to shika Omoenai was published in English as The NPCs in this Village Sim Game Must Be Real! by Seven Seas Entertainment from September 28, 2021 to May 28, 2024.

entry.name: Murazukuri Game no NPC ga Namami no Ningen to shika Omoenai
